timeline.bodyText: Could you please explain why we made this change here? I don't see where it's being used.
timeline.author: edmundoa

replies.bodyText:
Could you please explain why we made this change here?

The gist is that styled-components passes its styles via className so in order to do something like styled(Component) that Component needs to accept the className prop
https://styled-components.com/docs/basics#styling-any-component
replies.author: kyleknighted

replies.bodyText:
I don't see where it's being used.
